testcase.name: Given I have a story added
And I go to the story View page
When I add an acceptance criteria with "title1" and with "an invalid criteria"
Then it should fail with a validation error
Scenario: Add invalid acceptance criteria
Given I have a story added
And I go to the story View page
When I add an acceptance criteria with "title1" and with "Feature: test"
Then it should show the criteria titled "title1" successfully
Scenario: Add acceptance criteria
Given I have a story added
And I go to the story View page
And the story has a criteria and I view it
When I delete the acceptance criteria
Then it should return to the story
And it should be one criteria missing
Scenario: Update criteria
Given I have a story added
And I go to the story View page
And the story has a criteria and I view it
When I update the acceptance criteria with "title2" and with "Feature: updated criteria"
Then it should show the criteria titled "title2" successfully
Scenario: Update criteria
Given I have a story added
And I go to the story View page
When I add an acceptance criteria with "title1" and with
Then it should highlight the keywords
And indent rows in the criteria
Scenario: View acceptance criteria
Given I edit the scrum list's first story
When I enter "updatefirstnew" in the title textbox and I push the update button
Then I should get result "updatefirstnew" in new stories list
Scenario: UpdateFirst

testcase.name: Given I open the scrum tool add page
When I enter "title1" in the title textbox and I push the add button
Then I should get result "title1" in stories list
Scenario: Title1
